title: A Simple Cardano NFT Mobile Wallet
description: It's a mobile-first era. There're some Cardano mobile wallet apps, but none of them are designed for those who are not familiar with crypto.
solution: To make the ecosystem of Cardano NFT grow faster, we need a super simple mobile wallet app for newcomers.
experience:
\- 12 years experience in mobile app

\- 5 years experience in blockchain

\- Experienced in the development of global software products
